mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Father of Liberty - A Sound and Light Program at Mount Vernon, May 19, 1976
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: 'The Gazette Staff'
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Debut of 'The Father of Liberty - A Sound and Light Program' to hundreds of special guests in attendance for the outdoor event at Mount Vernon. Prior to the performance, a presentation of the program as a Bicentennial gift to the United States was made by French President d'Estaing on behalf of the French Republic to President Ford who in turn gifted the production to Mount Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American Revolution Bicentennial, 1976
